text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/479950f6c9aee4806f28a2b2fe5471e18a034cff|patch 8.2.0131: command line is not cleared when switching tabs>
patch 8.2.0131: command line is not cleared when switching tabs

Problem:    Command line is not cleared when switching tabs and the command
            line height differs.
Solution:   Set the "clear_cmdline" flag when needed. (Naruhiko Nishino,
            closes #5495)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6b915c0c0ee7ef82f8d3d310a4345e098cb929b0|patch 8.2.0128: cannot list options one per line>
patch 8.2.0128: cannot list options one per line

Problem:    Cannot list options one per line.
Solution:   Use ":set!" to list one option per line.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0128: cannot list options one per line · vim/vim@6b915c0
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0128: cannot list options one per line · vim/vim@6b915c0
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot list options one per line. Solution: Use ":set!" to list one option per line.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/1a928c20992279dc05c90d152e3f2fa884cf4bc9|patch 8.2.0129: MS-Windows installer doesn't use Turkish translations>
patch 8.2.0129: MS-Windows installer doesn't use Turkish translations

Problem:    MS-Windows installer doesn't use Turkish translations.
Solution:   Enable the Turkish translations and fix a few. (Emir Sarı,
            closes #5493)
